title: Riot failed... Lose a game too bots.
body:
I think it would have made it funnier if you made the bots surrender at 20/30 minutes. Just too mess with people more... 
{{summoner:1}} {{summoner:11}}  was a nice touch.

Me and my friends did this mission, I was in 3 of them for fun.

replies.body: First, the bots don't actually have Cleanse and Smite; it's just a display bug. Second, that bug has been there for months, since they gave us this new, shitty load screen.
